title: How much time will the first reading of the entire PSIR optional require? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: I have PSIR OPTIONAL and I'm preparing for 2020   It took me 1 month to cover full syllabus once Reading carefully with understanding and marking imp lines. Including 11th political theory NCERT Shubhra mam’s notes 4 booklet IR booklet Some chapters From GB Gauba. Some chapters from Pax india related to India's foreign policy. Article from the the Indian express Also pt 365 by Insights IAS. This helps me to understand the subject and it's requirements. I think it will take 2 3 months to complete the subject so that you can write good and satisfactory answer. Right now I'm doing revision daily 2 hours Bcoz the prelims are near so can't give much time. But I will do one Revision of imp topics in this month. And will complete the syllabus with answer writing within one and a half months after prelims. Tysm✌️
